msbt.message: I'm gonna be unpacking all day, so let's hang out tomorrow.Gotta remember to lift with the legs. It's great for the glutes, !
I wonder if I could use the boxes as tables. All I'd have to do is flip 'em over, Nah, they'd collapse under my free weights. Oh well! Back to work!
So many boxesThis unpacking is cutting into my workout time. Guess I'm doing triple sets for a while.
What's up! Here for an early workout?Sorry, I'm gonna be unpacking all day. Swing by tomorrow, alright, ?
I am so tired of unpacking.I'm gonna dream of boxes. I'll be benching boxes, doing box deadlifts, my biceps will be boxes
Whew! If there's one good thing about all this unpackingIt's the soreness I'm gonna feel in the morning, !
Hmm If I put the leg press over there, I'll have more room for my warm-up,
This isn't working What if I stack my weights against the wall
Hmm I could put the bench here and the kettlebells over there
Oh! I guess you heard that.I'm just flexing the brain muscles to map out my routine. I want this room to be perfect!
